1013923678164279297.full_text: The #NanjingMassacre of 1937 has been recognized as one of the worst atrocities of the 20th century. The murder and sexual assault of an estimated 200,000 Chinese nationals following the fall of the city was a horrific act of violence that must not be forgotten.
